effect_entries.effect:
Used on a party Pokémon in battle
:   Selects another friendly Pokémon at random.  If that Pokémon is holding an item normally activated by some condition—i.e., not continuous and passive—its effect is forcibly activated.

This item can only be obtained or used via the Wonder Launcher.
effect_entries.short_effect: Forcibly activates a friendly Pokémon's held item.

flavor_text_entries.text:
使うと　味方の　ポケモンが
持っている　道具を　すぐ使う。

When used, it causes an ally
Pokémon to use its held item.

Usandolo, un Pokémon della squadra userà
immediatamente il proprio strumento.

Misterioso amuleto brillante que aumenta la
probabilidad de encontrar Pokémon variocolores.

Der Mitstreiter setzt bei Gebrauch sofort das
von ihm getragene Item ein.

Permet d’utiliser immédiatement l’objet tenu par
un Pokémon de l’équipe.

사용하면 같은 편 포켓몬이
지니고 있는 도구를 바로 쓴다.

つかうと　みかたの　ポケモンが
もっている　どうぐを　すぐつかう。

When used, it causes an ally Pokémon
to use its held item.

When used, it causes an ally Pokémon
to use its held item.

Permet d’utiliser immédiatement
l’objet tenu par un Pokémon de
l’équipe.
